Module gfx

source code

Various graphical odds and ends, including particle systems and post-processing effects

Classes [hide private]
  ViewObjectBag
A managed collection of view objects.
  GLViewObject2D
A view object representing a 2d object with possibly dynamic position and angle
  Particle
A point particle, as handled by a particle system.
  Particle2D
A 2D non-point particle, as handled by a SlowParticleSystem.
  ParticleSystem
A system of point particles.
  SlowParticleSystem
A particle system with individually drawn particles.
  DisplayList
A wrapper class for GL display lists.

Function Details [hide private]

gl_compiled_function(func)

source code 

Function decorator which thunks function calls as GL display lists. Be warned that these are never freed.

gl_compiled_method(func)

source code 

Method decorator which thunks method calls as GL display lists. These are freed upon garbage collection of the relevant object instance.

motion_blur(func)

source code 

Function decorator implementing a motion blur post-processing effect. To be applied to the main rendering function.

vector_glow(func)

source code 

Function decorator implementing a 'vector glow' post-processing effect. To be applied to the main rendering function.
